aiAssistant.title: AI Farming Assistant
aiAssistant.inputPlaceholder: Ask about farming, describe your image...

welcome.summary:
Hello! I'm {appName}'s AI Knowledge assistant, your dedicated partner for all things agriculture!
Wondering about sustainable farming, navigating the agri-supply chain, or boosting your farming business? Just ask! I can also guide you through using the DamDoh app's features.

**Got a crop concern?**
Tap the image upload icon (<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="2" strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-image-up inline-block relative -top-px"><path d="M10.3 21H5a2 2 0 0 1-2-2V5a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v10l-3.1-3.1a2 2 0 0 0-2.814.014L13 16"></path><path d="m14 19.5 3-3 3 3"></path><path d="M17 22v-5.5"></path><circle cx="9" cy="9" r="2"></circle></svg>) to upload a photo, or the camera icon (<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="2" strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-camera inline-block relative -top-px"><path d="M14.5 4h-5L7 7H4a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v9a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h16a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V9a2 2 0 0 0-2-2h-3l-2.5-3z"></path><circle cx="12" cy="13" r="3"></circle></svg>) to snap a picture of any plant issues. I'll do my best to analyze it and suggest sustainable solutions.

Ready to explore? How can I assist you today?
welcome.suggestion1: How do I make Fish Amino Acid?
welcome.suggestion2: What is 'God's Blanket' in Farming God's Way?
welcome.suggestion3: How can I improve my soil health?

appearanceTab.description: Customize the look and feel of the DamDoh platform.

language.title: Language

communityGuidelines.title: DamDoh Community Guidelines
communityGuidelines.subtitle: Our commitment to fostering a safe, respectful, and productive environment for all agricultural stakeholders.
communityGuidelines.intro: Welcome to DamDoh! By joining our platform, you agree to abide by these guidelines to ensure a positive experience for everyone. Violations may result in content removal, account suspension, or other actions deemed necessary.

guideline1.title: Be Respectful and Constructive
guideline1.description: Treat all members of the DamDoh community with respect. Engage in constructive discussions, share knowledge positively, and avoid personal attacks, harassment, or hate speech.

guideline2.title: Maintain Authenticity and Transparency
guideline2.description: Represent yourself and your business honestly. Do not impersonate others or provide misleading information in your profile, listings, or communications. Clearly state your role in the supply chain.

guideline3.title: Keep Discussions Relevant
guideline3.description: When participating in forums or groups, ensure your contributions are relevant to the topic. Avoid spamming, unsolicited advertising, or off-topic content. Focus on agricultural supply chain matters.

guideline4.title: Foster Fair and Ethical Trade
guideline4.description: Conduct business dealings with integrity. Honor commitments, provide accurate product/service descriptions, and engage in fair pricing. DamDoh promotes ethical trade practices.

guideline5.title: Promote Sustainable Practices
guideline5.description: We encourage discussions and sharing of knowledge related to sustainable and regenerative agriculture. Support initiatives that improve soil health, biodiversity, and food security.

communityGuidelines.reportingContent: If you encounter content or behavior that violates these guidelines, please report it to our moderation team through the platform's reporting tools or by contacting
communityGuidelines.conclusion: Thank you for helping us build a thriving and trustworthy agricultural supply chain community on DamDoh!

helpCenter.title: DamDoh Help Center
helpCenter.subtitle: Find answers to your questions, tutorials, and guides to get the most out of DamDoh.
helpCenter.searchPrompt: How can we help you today?
helpCenter.searchPlaceholder: Search our knowledge base (e.g., 'how to list product', 'change password')
helpCenter.contactDescription: If you can't find what you're looking for, our support team is ready to assist you.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started (Placeholder)
gettingStarted.content: This section will cover creating your account, setting up your profile, and navigating the DamDoh platform for the first time. Tutorials and step-by-step guides will be available here.

marketplaceGuide.title: Marketplace Guide (Placeholder)
marketplaceGuide.content: Learn how to create listings for products and services, search the marketplace, connect with buyers/sellers, and manage your transactions. Tips for effective listings and safe trading will be included.

careers.title: Join Our Mission at DamDoh
careers.subtitle: We're building a future where technology and collaboration transform the agricultural supply chain for the better.

whyWorkWithUs.title: Why Work With Us?
whyWorkWithUs.intro: At DamDoh, you'll be part of a dynamic team passionate about solving real-world challenges in agriculture. We foster a culture of innovation, continuous learning, and impact. If you're driven to make a difference and contribute to a more sustainable and equitable food system, DamDoh is the place for you.
whyWorkWithUs.point1: Meaningful work that directly impacts global food security.
whyWorkWithUs.point3: Opportunities for professional growth and development.
whyWorkWithUs.point4: Competitive compensation and benefits (Details coming soon).
whyWorkWithUs.point5: Flexible work arrangements for many roles.

job1.title: Lead Agricultural Supply Chain Analyst
job1.description: Seeking an experienced analyst to optimize supply chain operations, develop data-driven strategies, and support our network of stakeholders. Strong background in agricultural economics and logistics required.

job2.title: Community Manager - Farmer Engagement
job2.description: Passionate about agriculture and community building? Join us to support and grow our farmer network in East Africa. Excellent communication and field experience needed.

job3.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer (Agri-Tech)
job3.description: Develop innovative features for the DamDoh platform. Proficient in Next.js, TypeScript, and backend technologies. Experience with GIS or agricultural data is a plus.

noOpenings.title: No Current Openings
noOpenings.content1: We are always looking for talented individuals to join our team. Please check back later for specific job postings, or feel free to send your resume to

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, feedback, or a partnership proposal, please reach out.
contact.callUsDesc: Our phone lines are open Monday - Friday, 9 AM - 5 PM (Your Timezone).
contact.officeLine2: 123 Agri-Tech Avenue, Food Security City, Global
contact.formNote: Note: This form is for demonstration. Actual submission is not implemented.

walletPage.stayTuned: Stay tuned for updates as we work to enable seamless and secure financial activities for the DamDoh agricultural network.
